text: @senatemajldr This program has been a useless money pit for years and you want to give them our COVID relief money? https://t.co/4Zbf9EIfig  And 1.75 billion for the FBI building across the street from Trumps hotel so another hotel can't be built. https://t.co/asE9dTIzZX
